pr_title: [BEAM-10896] Support ZetaSQL UNNEST syntax on array of struct type

timeline.message: Support ZetaSQL UNNEST syntax on array of struct type
Support ZetaSQL UNNEST syntax on array of struct type

timeline.bodyText: Could you put this in it's own package 'org.apache.beam.sdk.extensions.sql.zetasql.unnest' or something like that? That will make it easier to keep this isolated for eventual deletion.
timeline.author: apilloud

replies.bodyText: (And by this, I mean all the stuff in this PR that is copied and planned for deletion.)
replies.author: apilloud
